import React, { useState } from 'react'; import MinimalClockSelector from './clock/MinimalClockSelector'; const RiskInputForm = ({ onCalculate }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ age: '', clockHours: 0, detachmentSegments: [] }); const [clockSelection, setClockSelection] = useState({ tears: [], detachment: [] }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleClockChange = (selection) => { setClockSelection(selection); setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, clockHours: selection.tears.length, detachmentSegments: selection.detachment })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onCalculate(formData); }; const renderLeftContent = () => { return (
{/* Age input */}
{/* PVR Grade */}
{/* Current Selection - Desktop */}

Current Selection:

{clockSelection.tears.length === 0 ? 'No breaks marked' : `${clockSelection.tears.length} break(s) marked`}

{clockSelection.detachment.length === 0 ? 'No detachment marked' : `${clockSelection.detachment.length} segments detached`}

); }; const renderRightContent = () => { return (
{/* Vitrectomy Gauge */}
); }; return (
{renderLeftContent()}
{renderRightContent()}
{/* Current Selection - Mobile */}

Current Selection:

{clockSelection.tears.length === 0 ? 'No breaks marked' : `${clockSelection.tears.length} break(s) marked`}

{clockSelection.detachment.length === 0 ? 'No detachment marked' : `${clockSelection.detachment.length} segments detached`}

); }; export default RiskInputForm;
